author: Staff Reporter
text:
The vital organs of S. Dhandabani (50) of Dharapuram, who was declared brain dead after he suffered a brain stroke, were retrieved at PSG Hospital here on Thursday.

It is learnt that he was running a compute centre and was living with his wife and two daughters.

On getting consent from his parents, his organs were retrieved by the team of doctors.

Dhandabani’s liver was sent to Gem Hospital and both the kidneys to KG Hospital and were immediately transplanted to patients.
title: Organs retrieved from brain dead patient
